title: [Psychology] "Dishonesty during a pandemic: The concealment of COVID-19 information" study found that those who believed they had contracted COVID-19 engaged in greater rates of concealment and evaluated concealment more positively compared to those without the virus

[Biology] Singaporean researchers have discovered a Covid-19 variant which is causing milder infections (less patients developed low oxygen levels or required intensive care) as a result of a major deletion in its genome
